# Class: TouchBarGroup

## Class: TouchBarGroup[â€‹](#class-touchbargroup "Direct link to Class: TouchBarGroup") 

> Create a group in the touch bar for native macOS applications

Process: [Main](/docs/latest/glossary#main-process)\
*This class is not exported from the `'electron'` module. It is only available as a return value of other methods in the Electron API.*

### `new TouchBarGroup(options)`[â€‹](#new-touchbargroupoptions "Direct link to new-touchbargroupoptions") 

- `options` Object
  - `items` [TouchBar](/docs/latest/api/touch-bar) - Items to display as a group.
